description:
Once at the edge of our solar system, the Star Force encounters Planet Berth`s flagship, the Legendra. Its green-skinned captain, Buckfaster Ram, requests temporary refuge at one of Earth`s outposts. Afterwards, the Star Force escorts the Legendra into space where both are attacked by Galman General Dagon`s fleet. Earth`s neutrality is considered compromised.
[Source: The Wave Motion Web Page http://www.desslok.com]
